summary: The QM7bDataset class encapsulates the QM7b molecular graph dataset, offering 7,211 graphs with atom (node) and bond (edge) information and 14 regression targets. It handles downloading, caching, processing, and optional transformation of DGLGraph objects, exposing edge features derived from the Coulomb matrix for each molecule.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use, iterable dataset that simplifies loading and preprocessing of QM7b molecular graphs for training and evaluating graph neural network models on quantum‑chemical regression tasks.
